name: Balsamiq Mockups Project
summary: A BMPR file is a project file created by Balsamiq Mockups, an application used to wireframe websites and mobile app UIs . It contains one or more wireframes, as well as UI elements added to those wireframes. Balsamiq Mockups users can export the wireframes BMPR files contain in the .PDF or .PNG formats, to share with others.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
